lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro and Janko Tipsarevic found themselves on a practice court together at Wimbledon, though they spent more time talking than hitting the ball.

headline.print_headline: For Del Potro and Tipsarevic, 1st US Open Wins Since 2013
headline.main: For Del Potro and Tipsarevic, 1st US Open Wins Since 2013

snippet: Juan Martin del Potro and Janko Tipsarevic found themselves on a practice court together at Wimbledon, though they spent more time talking than hitting the ball....
